noteLab.util
Class StartupUtilities.MainFrameLoader

java.lang.Object
  noteLab.util.StartupUtilities.MainFrameLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
NoteLabFileLoadedListener
Enclosing class:
StartupUtilities
private static class StartupUtilities.MainFrameLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements NoteLabFileLoadedListener

This class is responsible for instructing a NoteLabFileLoader to load a CompositeCanvas and construct a MainFrame after the canvas has been loaded.

Author:
Dominic Kramer

Constructor Summary
StartupUtilities.MainFrameLoader()
          Constructs a loader which loads a MainFrame not loaded from a file.
StartupUtilities.MainFrameLoader(java.io.File file)
          Constructs a loader which loads a CompositeCanvas from the given file and constructs a MainFrame for the canvas.

Constructor Detail

StartupUtilities.MainFrameLoader

public StartupUtilities.MainFrameLoader()
Constructs a loader which loads a MainFrame not loaded from a file.

StartupUtilities.MainFrameLoader

public StartupUtilities.MainFrameLoader(java.io.File file)
Constructs a loader which loads a CompositeCanvas from the given file and constructs a MainFrame for the canvas.

Parameters:
file - The file which is to be loaded or null if the MainFrame should be loaded whithout reading a file.
Method Detail

noteLabFileLoaded

public void noteLabFileLoaded(CompositeCanvas canvas)
Invoked when a NoteLab native file has been loaded.

Specified by:
noteLabFileLoaded in interface NoteLabFileLoadedListener
Parameters:
canvas - The CompositeCanvas that has just been loaded.

launchMainFrame

private void launchMainFrame(CompositeCanvas canvas)
This method serves to create a MainFrame using the given CompositeCanvas. The MainFrame startup code is placed on the AWT event dispatching queue and the frame is loaded when the system is ready.

Parameters:
canvas - If null a new MainFrame not based on a CompositeCanvas is created. Otherwise, a MainFrame based on the given CompositeCanvas is constructed.
